project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design and implement a Python-based quiz game that asks multiple-choice questions, tracks the user's score, and displays it at the end.

task.name: Define the structure for storing questions and answers
Implement the game loop for asking questions
Implement score tracking for correct answers
Display the final score at the end of the game
Write tests for each of the implemented features to ensure functionality
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure accuracy and performance
